subdisciplines.name: Satire
subdisciplines.description: The use of humor, irony, exaggeration, or ridicule to expose and criticize people's stupidity or vices, particularly in the context of contemporary politics and other topical issues.

subdisciplines.name: Parody
subdisciplines.description: A work created to imitate, make fun of, or comment on an original work or its subject matter in a humorous way.

subdisciplines.name: Comedy Writing
subdisciplines.description: Writing in which humor, satire, irony, parody, absurdity, or other comic elements are used to entertain, inform, or make a point.
